import { InfoOutlined, PlayArrow } from "@material-ui/icons"; import "./feature.scss" export default function Feature({type}) { return (
{type && (
{type === "movie" ? "Movies" : "Series"}
)}

GALAXY

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Reprehenderit veniam quos unde fugiat perspiciatis quibusdam delectus, ab atque ullam nesciunt odit sed et, eligendi aliquid optio tenetur deserunt iure nihil.
); }
